example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼の成績は抜群だった

example_sentences.eng_trans: She is unrivaled in sports./She far excels others at [in] sports.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼女はスポーツが抜群だ

example_sentences.eng_trans: He is by far the best English speaker in his class.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼はクラスの中では抜群に英語がうまい
